subject: Hurricane Katrina
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks viewed one part of Spike Lee’s four-hour documentary, “When the Levees Broke: A Requiem in Four Acts,” earlier this month at their training camp.
snippet: The Knicks viewed one part of Spike Lee’s four-hour documentary, “When the Levees Broke: A Requiem in Four Acts,” earlier this month at their training camp.
